data.homeworkTitle: 第二十四章  肾上腺皮质激素类药

questions.title: 主要影响水盐代谢的肾上腺皮质激素是：
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"可的松","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"氢化可的松","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"醛固酮","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"强地松龙","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"强地松","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"一般和内毒素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"提高机体对细菌内毒素的耐受力","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"对抗外毒素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"加速机体对细菌外毒素代谢","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"加速机体对细菌内毒素代谢","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"一般午12点","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"上午8点","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"下午8点","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"下午5点","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"夜间11点","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"高血钾","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"低血糖","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"向心性肥胖","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"高血钙","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"减少磷的排泄","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"混合感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"简单产生抗药性菌株感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"病因未明的感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"抗菌药不能控制的严重感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"严重感染伴毒血症或休克","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"反跳现象","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"停药后综合症","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"类皮质醇增多症","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"类固醇性糖尿病","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"医源性肾上腺皮质功能不全","IsAnswer":true}]
